document.full_text: portugal's center-right social democrats (psd) scored a convincing win over the socialists in an election on sunday, punishing the outgoing government for a 78 billion euro bailout that will bring deep austerity.
document.title: portuguese centre-right beats socialists in vote
lines_and_colors: portugal's center-right social democrats (psd) scored a convincing win over the socialists in an election on sunday, punishing the outgoing government for a 78 billion euro bailout that will bring deep austerity.
